statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPSpannerInstanceBackup)<-[:HAS_BACKUP]-(:GCPSpannerInstanceDatabase)<-[:HAS_DATABASE]-(:GCPSpannerInstance)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Spanner Instance Backup that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.
